context_bundle.summary: Datadog is a unified observability platform providing monitoring, security, and analytics for cloud-scale applications

onboarding.quick_start: helm repo add datadog https://helm.datadoghq.com && helm install datadog-agent datadog/datadog --namespace datadog --set datadog.apiKey=<api-key>
common_patterns: Agent deployment: 'helm install datadog-agent --set datadog.apiKey=<key> --set datadog.site=datadoghq.com'
APM tracing: Set 'apm.enabled=true' and instrument applications with Datadog tracing libraries
Log collection: 'logs.enabled=true' and 'logs.collect_all_logs=true' for comprehensive logging
Integrations: 'confd:<config_name>.yaml' for specific technology integrations (Redis, Postgres, etc.)
known_errors: API key invalid: 'curl -H 'DD-API-KEY: <key>' https://api.datadoghq.com/api/v1/validate' and verify key permissions
High memory usage: 'kubectl top pods -n datadog' and adjust 'datadog.resources.requests.memory'
No APM traces: 'curl http://localhost:8126/v0.7/pipelines' and verify application instrumentation
Logs not collected: 'kubectl logs -n datadog datadog-agent' and check log collection configuration
Dashboard empty: 'ddog dashboard list' and verify metric names and tags match dashboard queries
